policies.rule: Shipper must complete KYC before publishing booking
One active bid per booking per operator
Ledger cannot go negative
Shipper must approve driver before shipment begins
Cannot bypass OTP for delivery completion
GPS ping every 60 seconds mandatory
Tracking >30 min missing = alert
Trucks must be: HGV, 2018+, BS4/BS6, NP valid
Trucks with expired docs auto-block
Mandatory inspection every 120 days
Operator may onboard up to 10 trucks only
Driver cannot have more than one active shipment
Admin must justify override
Admin cannot modify ledger
OTP Delivery Rule - OTP is the only valid proof of delivery completion
Ledger Integrity - Operator ledger cannot go negative, no exceptions
Truck Eligibility - HGV only, Year â‰¥ 2018, BS4/BS6, National Permit mandatory
Driver Assignment & Approval Flow - Driver must be approved by shipper before shipment starts
Accident/Breakdown Flow - Driver reports, operator assigns alternate truck, shipper re-approves
Fake Tracking Detection - System marks suspicious tracking, alerts admin, freezes shipment if mismatch
Delivery Fraud - POD image reused or OTP misuse triggers shipment freeze and investigation
